name: .DNS File Extension
summary: Learn about .DNS files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Game file created by Duke Nukem Forever, a first-person shooter game that is the sequel to Duke Nukem 3D; stores a checkpoint within a game level; used for saving and loading game progress.

content: DNS files are saved to the \​Maps\​checkpoints\​ directory of the Duke Nukem Forever installation.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
